channel.title: World News Today, Trending World News, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
channel.description: World News Today: Read the latest world news headlines, Current International breaking news world wide. In depth analysis and top news headlines world wide.

image.title: World News Today, Trending World News, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: Watch: Passengers duct-tape man who demanded to exit American Airlines flight midair
item.description: An American Airlines flight from Milwaukee to Dallas-Fort Worth turned chaotic when a Canadian passenger attempted to open a cabin door mid-flight, claiming he needed to exit. The situation escalated quickly as the agitated passenger injured a flight attendant while trying to reach the door.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: When Ellen DeGeneres 'offered' Donald Trump her mom to date. Old video goes viral
item.description: British broadcaster Piers Morgan mockingly reacted to the news of Ellen leaving the US to settle in England writing: "OMG...no!". Ellen was forced to end her Ellen Degeneres Show after a report accused her of fostering a toxic workplace environment. ​After Ellen's news, an old clip of Ellen with Donald Trump went viral in which Ellen offered her mother to Trump for dating - as part of the joke they were playing. "Yeah, look at her. And she is available if you are interested. I'd like to offer her..." Ellen told Trump.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: What immigration policies are expected in Trump's second administration?
item.description: Donald Trump, in his bid for re-election, has vowed to implement stringent immigration measures if he returns to the White House. His plans include large-scale deportations, bolstering border security, and overturning existing policies like DACA. Trump's proposals have sparked controversy and legal challenges, setting the stage for a contentious debate on immigration.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Matt Gaetz reveals his future plan: 'Won't return to Congress, will fight for...'
item.description: In an interview with Charlie Kirk, Matt Gaetz revealed that he will not be returning to Congress now that he is not a nomination for the attorney general post. Gaetz stated that he would continue to support former President Donald Trump and would be "a big voice" outside of elected office.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Fact check: Did Elon Musk accuse Jeff Bezos' ex-wife, MacKenzie Scott, of 'destroying Western civilization'?
item.description: Elon Musk sparked controversy with a now-deleted tweet, suggesting that wealthy ex-wives like MacKenzie Scott, who criticize their former husbands, are a contributing factor to the downfall of Western civilization. Musk's comment was in response to a post highlighting Scott's philanthropic efforts, which largely focus on racial and gender equality.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Melania cooks for Trump, Barron as RFK Jr wants to change President-elect's diet
item.description: Melania Trump has been preparing family dinners at Trump Tower and encouraging healthier eating habits for her husband, President-elect Donald Trump, Page Six reported adding that Melania and Kennedy Jr have ganged up on Trump to make him eat healthy. The report comes as Kennedy himself was seen posing with McDonald's food. But insiders said it was just for fun and Kennedy probably didn't eat those.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump’s hush money case sentencing postponed indefinitely, granted permission to seek dismissal
item.description: A judge has indefinitely delayed the sentencing of former President Donald Trump in his criminal hush money case. Trump's legal team successfully argued for a postponement, citing potential disruptions to his presidential duties. The judge also granted Trump permission to file for dismissal of the case, setting deadlines for December.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Did Trump leave Mar-a-Lago in ambulance? Here is the truth
item.description: Speculation arose on social media about Donald Trump's health after reports of ambulances leaving Mar-a-Lago. However, the Secret Service clarified that the ambulances were part of Vice President-elect JD Vance's motorcade and not related to any emergency involving Trump. Trump's communications director criticized reporters for spreading unfounded rumors, highlighting the intense scrutiny surrounding the former president's health.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Mike Rogers won't get FBI, claims Trump team member. It's only Kash Patel then?
item.description: Former President Donald Trump is not considering Mike Rogers, a former FBI special agent and congressman, for a leadership role at the FBI, according to Trump's deputy chief of staff. While Trump is seeking a MAGA loyalist to potentially replace FBI Director Christopher Wray, experts have expressed concerns over another candidate, Kash Patel, due to his controversial past.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Wisconsin man fakes death to escape family, to meet woman in Uzbekistan
item.description: A Wisconsin man, Ryan Borgwardt, who vanished in August after a supposed kayaking accident, has been found alive in Eastern Europe. Borgwardt admitted to authorities that he staged his drowning to escape his life and has been communicating with them daily.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Did Pam Bondi let Jeffrey Epstein slide; accept bribe from Trump University?
item.description: In 2013, Bondi's office received complaints from people alleging they had been scammed by Donald Trump's Trump University seminars. Florida did not pursue the case and Bondi's political committee received a $25000 donation from Donald Trump's foundation. At that time both Trump and Bondi denied any donation and link to that.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Diddy-Ellen DeGeneres old video viral after Elon Musk fuels this conspiracy theory
item.description: As Ellen DeGeneres leaves the US following Donald Trump's win, her old photos, videos, birthday wishes for P Diddy resurfaced on social media with Elon Musk fuelling one conspiracy theory that Ellen had to leave US because of her past links with Diddy. Another viral video showed when Ellen offered her mother to a young Donald Trump on a show, though jokingly.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Bondi, Rubio, Wiles, Waltz: How Trump's Florida lobby is set to conquer DC
item.description: With Trump’s Mar-a-Lago estate in Palm Beach serving as a political nerve center, the state has cemented itself as a critical hub for national influence. Key Floridians are taking top spots in Trump’s administration, wielding immense sway over the direction of U.S. policies. Here’s a closer look at the power players and how they’re shaping Washington under Team Trump.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Can Matt Gaetz return to his seat after he resigned from Congress? 5 possibilities
item.description: Matt Gaetz, it seems, does not want to return to Congress now that he opted out of the Attorney General nomination. Returning to Congress would require a special election that he has to win, but returning to Congress would also mean the report probing the sexual misconduct allegations against him would be published without any hitch. Gaetz is probably eying a different role in Trump administration.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Dana White's shocking U-turn on politics after supporting Trump: 'Gross, never f**king doing this'
item.description: UFC CEO Dana White said politics is gross and disgusting and he wants nothing to do with it after he made several appearances with Donald Trump before and after the election. He clarified that his appearances and support for Donald Trump are only for Trump who is a long-time friend, it has nothing to do with the Republican party or politics.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Did you know? Pam Bondi and Tim Walz are almost the same age
item.description: Pamela Jo Bondi, born November 17, 1965, in Tampa, Florida, is a seasoned attorney, former Florida Attorney General, and prominent figure in conservative circles. Known for her sharp legal mind and media-savvy approach, Bondi made waves during her two terms as Florida’s Attorney General from 2011 to 2019.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Controlled explosion' outside US embassy in London, confirms UK Police
item.description: A controlled explosion was carried out near the US Embassy in London after a suspicious package was found. Authorities are investigating the incident and have cordoned off the area. In a separate incident, a suspected prohibited item was found in luggage at Gatwick Airport, leading to the evacuation of the South Terminal and the deployment of a bomb squad.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: How did Matt Gaetz go from Donald Trump’s top pick to withdrawing in eight days?
item.description: Congressman Matt Gaetz withdrew his nomination for attorney general just eight days after it was announced by President-elect Donald Trump. The nomination sparked controversy and faced opposition from within the justice department. Gaetz cited the confirmation process as a distraction and withdrew his name. Trump has since nominated former Florida attorney general Pam Bondi for the position.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Dragon believer' Joe Rogan turns The View's Joy Behar’s critique into laugh fest
item.description: Joe Rogan playfully responded to criticism from "The View" co-host Joy Behar, who accused him of spreading misinformation by believing in dragons. Behar cited Rogan's speculation about dinosaur-like creatures resembling dragons found in ancient cultures. Rogan humorously embraced the "Dragon Believer" label on social media and shared content exploring the possibility of dragons.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Once Robert F Kennedy Jr blasted Donald Trump as 'threat to democracy' and compared him to Hitler
item.description: Robert F Kennedy Jr, recently tapped as Donald Trump's secretary of health and human services, was once a vocal critic of the former president. Recordings reveal Kennedy compared Trump's rhetoric and leadership style to Hitler and Mussolini, accusing him of exploiting fear and prejudice. Despite his past criticisms, Kennedy now expresses support for Trump's vision.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
